DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate Anecortave Acetate Depot Suspension ( 15 mg 30 mg ) safe effective arrest progression non-exudative ( dry ) age-related macular degeneration patient risk progress exudative ( wet ) age-related macular degeneration .
